attributes.action: I think children should be taught about serious topics throughout education.
attributes.additional_details:
Some of these issues may have been as a result of not being informed about them throughout education.
It is not only me who has experienced situations like I have previously talked about. After consulting with numerous acquaintances and close friends, they too have told me about similar situations they have experienced.
attributes.background: Needing to memorise poems is pointless, from my point of view. This is because growing up and looking up to my family I do not see them worrying about, for example, what the conceit of John Agard's "Checkin' Out Me History" was and quotes to prove that, rather them talking about financial issues.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean by "serious topics". 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
